Package siminov.web.adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAdapter
    It is a blue print for classes which wants to provide implementation for Adapter bridge between native and web
    IHandler
    Exposes methods to deal with actual request comes from WEB-TO-NATIVE or NATIVE-TO-WEB.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Adapter
    Handle Request between NATIVE-TO-WEB.
    AdapterFactory
    It caches Adapter Instance and based on requirement server request.
    AdapterHandler
    It works has a bridge between WEB-TO-NATIVE and NATIVE-TO-WEB, basically every request is handled by this class.
